jparsec.graph

Class VISADChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.graph.VISADChart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class VISADChart
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
    A VISAD chart element consisting on a grid chart, a VISAD cube, and the control panel, to show in detail a 3d cube of data.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setPreferences

        public void setPreferences(float v,
                  boolean integrated,
                  java.lang.String[] contours,
                  float x0,
                  float xf,
                  float y0,
                  float yf,
                  float z0,
                  float zf)
        Set certain parameters for the chart.
        Parameters:
        v - Initial velocity of the plane shown.
        integrated - Integrated intensity or not.
        contours - Contours.
        x0 - Initial RA offset.
        xf - Final RA offset.
        y0 - Initial DEC offset.
        yf - Final DEC offset.
        z0 - Initial v.
        zf - Final v.

      • setPreferences

        public void setPreferences(float v,
                  boolean integrated,
                  java.lang.String[] contours)
        Set certain parameters for the chart.
        Parameters:
        v - Initial velocity of the plane shown.
        integrated - Integrated intensity or not.
        contours - Contours.
